2.1.1.1. glofrim.Glofrim¶

class glofrim.Glofrim(loglevel=20)[source]¶

Central CSDMS-compliant BMI implementation; generic script providing function sceleton to other model-specified BMIs; defining main and central model and BMI information

Arguments:
EBmi {class} – Interface (abstract base class) for a model that implements the CSDMS BMI (Basic Model Interface).
Raises:
ValueError – Raised if syntax requesting variable name is not correct AssertionError – Raised if model dt is not a whole number of GLOFRIM dt Warning – Warning is raised if two-step model initialization is not correctly executed ValueError – Raised if config-files of models to be coupled are not defined in ini-file ValueError – Raised if engines (i.e. executables) for models to be coupled are not specified in ini/env-file ValueError – Raised if no exchanges are specified in GLOFRIM ini-file ValueError – Raised if an unspported model is specified ValueError – Raised if unknown variables are specified Warning – Warning is raised if two-step model initialization is not correctly executed Warning – Raised in models are not initialized before updating Exception – Raised if model end time is already reached; no further updating possible Exception – Raised if specified time is smaller than time step or later than model end time NotImplementedError – SpinUp is not implemented for central BMI AssertionError – Raised if no grid is set before AssertionError – Raised if no 1D network is set before
__init__(loglevel=20)[source]¶

x.__init__(…) initializes x; see help(type(x)) for signature

Methods

__init__([loglevel]) x.__init__(…) initializes x; see help(type(x)) for signature
exchange(from_mod, to_mod, from_vars, …[, add]) Exchanges variable content from specified source variable in source model to a specified destination variable in the destination model; exchange is possible for entire grid or at specified indices; coupling either as totals or fractional values depending on exchange; source variable can either add to destination variable or overwrite it
exchange_at_indices(from_mod, to_mod, …[, add]) Exchanges variable content from specified source variable in source model to a specified destination variable in the destination model for user-specified indices; coupling either as totals or fractional values depending on exchange; source variable can either add to destination variable or overwrite it
exchange_same_grid(from_mod, to_mod, …[, add]) Exchanges variable content from specified source variable in source model to a specified destination variable in the destination model for the entire grid; source variable can either add to destination variable or overwrite it
finalize() Finalizes the model; shuts down all operations and closes output files.
get_attribute_names() Provides list with all model attribute names from model config file
get_attribute_value(attribute_name) gets attribute value in in underlying model; attribute_name should use the following convention model_name.section_name:attribute_name
get_component_name() Returns component name of specified model
get_current_time() Provides current model time
get_end_time() Provides end time of model
get_grid_type() Provides grid type of model; can be regular, flexible or unit catchment grid
get_input_var_names() Returns list with all possible input variable names that can be used as exchange TO the specified model; must be specified in model specific BMI class.
get_model_type() Returns type of specified model; possible types are hydrologic, routing, or hydrodynamic model
get_obs() Under construction; function to get observation points to read out model output on the fly.
get_output_var_names() Returns list with all possible output variable names that can be used as exchange FROM the specified model; must be specified in model specific BMI class.
get_start_time() Provides start time of model
get_time_step() Provides time step of model
get_time_units() Provides time unit of model.
get_value(long_var_name, **kwargs) Retrieval of value of a certain exposed variable; entries with fill_value are replaced with NaN values
get_value_at_indices(long_var_name, inds, …) Retrieval of value at a specific index of a certain exposed variable; entries with fill_value are replaced with NaN values
get_var_nbytes(long_var_name) Provides number of bytes of specified variable
get_var_rank(long_var_name) Provides rank (i.e.
get_var_shape(long_var_name) Provides shape of specified variable
get_var_size(long_var_name) Provides size (i.e.
get_var_type(long_var_name) Returns the type of a user-specified model variable exposed via BMI
get_var_units(long_var_name) Provides units of specified variable
index(x, y, mod[, in1d]) Finds the index in model data grid associated with coordinates in lat/lon projection of a user-specified point
initialize(config_fn) Initializes the model following a two-step initialization procedure; first, the config-file is initialized and where necessary aligned with overall model settings (e.g.
initialize_config(config_fn[, env_fn]) Initializing the model configuration file; aligning GLOFRIM specifications for coupled runs to be consistent with overall run settings; with environment file (env-file) local paths to model engines can be defined
initialize_model(**kwargs) Initializes the model, i.e.
set_attribute_value(attribute_name, …) sets attribute value in underlying model; attribute_name should use the following convention model_name.section_name:attribute_name
set_end_time(end_time) Overwriting default model end time with user-specified end time; format of provided end time must be yyyy-mm-dd
set_exchanges() Defines the variable exchanges between models together with necessary unit and time conversions; exchanges can be defined in ini/env-file; it is important that all fluxes/states in ini/env-file are to m3 for mass balance.
set_obs() Under construction; function to set observation points to read out model output on the fly.
set_out_dir(out_dir) Setting output directory of model; overwrites the default output directory
set_start_time(start_time) Overwriting default model start time with user-specified start time; format of provided start time must be yyyy-mm-dd
set_value(long_var_name, src, **kwargs) Overwriting of all values of a certain exposed variable with provided new values; entries with NaN value are replaced with fill_value; provided new values must match shape of aim variable
set_value_at_indices(long_var_name, inds, …) Overwriting of value at specific entry of a certain exposed variable with provided new values; entries with NaN value are replaced with fill_value
spinup() PCR-GLOBWB specific function (see pcr_bmi.py).
update([dt]) Updating model for a certain time step interval (default: None); checks whether model end time is already reached; requires that model-specific time step is a whole number of update time step.
update_until(t[, dt]) Updates the model until a certain time t is reached with an update time step dt.

Attributes

grid
